    Description
    Corpus
     
    Corpus.Builder
     
    CorpusLoader
    Utility class for loading word corpora from various sources
    Filter
    Represents a filter used to match against NGram objects in the Matchle game.
    GameLogic
    Shared game logic for the Matchle word guessing game.
    GameState
    Represents the complete state of a Matchle game session.
    GameStateManager
    Manages the persistence of game state to and from storage.
    IndexedCharacter
    A record representing a character at a specific position in a sequence.
    MatchleGame
    The main console implementation of the Matchle word guessing game.
    MatchleGUI
    A graphical user interface implementation of the Matchle word guessing game.
    NGram
    Represents an immutable sequence of characters with positional information.
    NullCharacterException
    Exception thrown when a character sequence contains a null character.
